title: Haunted and Possessed:  Love from Beyond the Grave
description: Fleeing an abusive marriage, Miranda McCormick leaves behind the world and identity she had carefully created, returning to her ancestral home and what her mother once coldly referred to as ‘Miranda’s Problem.’Sheltered from the world inside its thick adobe walls, Miranda is seduced by the ghost who has always loved her, sharing a passion so great it has lasted more than one lifetime. Desperate to explore her erotic fantasies, she struggles to reconcile her faith in the man who has loved her from beyond the grave with the nightmares plaguing her mind. Will she learn the secrets he has carefully hidden and risk losing everything, or can their eternal love be the magic needed to give him a lasting redemption?
author: Lillian Sinclair
